title: Welcome to my humble page, come on in!

sections.title: What is the purpose of this place?
paragraphs: This website was built to get some familiarity back with basic front-end tools, while learning GIT best practices along the way. In order to get some practice (and to really nail my understanding down) I'll write a bunch of artiles and publish them here as well.
Hope this is as userful to you as is was for me. Once I'm done building this website, I'll study other stuff, like angular development and production line best practices.
Feel free to stay for as long as you want!
